comments:
Currently we do a build if the source attachment is changed for the JRE system 
library for the default JRE.

Assigning to Joe, as he is working with related issue of import/export of JRE 
and JRE preference changes.

Fixed in VMStandin.  Only the system library path is considered when checking if two VMStandins 
are 'different' for purposes of building, the system library path & package root path are 
ignored.

I am getting NPEs in the new code:

Test case:
Switch off use default system libraries when editing the default JRE
For rt.jar, remove the source attachment
Ok back to the workbench
Go back in to the prefs, click on use default system libraries
Hit ok
